name: Greedy Bird
description:
"How much candy can you steal from the cursed pumpkin? The more you take, the angrier he gets and the faster the crushers come for you."

You'll need to click the game window so it can receive keyboard input. There's probably a solution to do that automatically, but I couldn't find it.

I really liked Flappy Bird when it first came out. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Flap - Spacebar

Move Left/Right - Left/Right Arrow Keys

Reset HiScore - r ( on game over screen)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music provided by OpenGameArt.org

Music Box Game Over III - Kim Lightyear

8bit MonsterVania Track 1 - HydroGene
